participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a warmhearted nature.
participant_1.background: i love to bake cookies. i have a dog. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, with a good sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i can drive a tractor. i enjoy listening to classical music. my favorite color is red. my sister is a pole dancer. i'm a christian.
